channel.title: Blogs on Console Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Console Labs

item.title: Shape Up
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Exploring We build up knowledge through collective team learning. This page is where lab members share their explorations of the financial world. Every week, we host a presentation to discuss our findings. This not only aids memory recall but also fosters a lasting learning culture within the team, keeping us updated on market trends. We cover a range of topics, from basics like ‘6 jars budgeting methodology’ to more current subjects like ‘web3 liquidity techniques’.

item.title: Log
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: A list of changes and updates to our experiments. RSS feed, regular updates. Newsletter for frens, monthly updates. January 2024 As the new year has come, we only focus on bringing mochi from beta to the production stage. On Mochi.gg, we introduce these features: Overview: An overview of assets and transaction history Explore: To help users explore the dynamics of our vibrant community, Mochi allows users to track, analyze, and optimize transactions to understand app performance and user behavior.
